name: 楊濠瞬
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Electromagnetic model
Week 3: Vector Analysis
Week 4: Orthogonal Coordinate Systems
Week 5: Gradient of a Scalar Field
Week 6: Divergence of a Vector Field
Week 7: Curl of a Vector Field
Week 8: Static Electric Fields
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Coulomb's Law
Week 11: Gauss's Law
Week 12: Boundary Conditions for Electrostatic Constant
Week 13: Steady Electric Currents
Week 14: Ohm's Law
Week 15: Kirchhoff's Current Law
Week 16: Static Magnetic Fields
Week 17: Boundary Conditions for Magnetostatic Fields
Week 18: Final Exam
materials: Fundamentals of Engineering Electromagnetics (An Adapted Version) by David K. Cheng
